channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says he's pursuing Greenland after perceived Nobel Peace Prize snub
item.description: "Considering your Country decided not to give me the Nobel Peace Prize… I no longer feel an obligation to think purely of Peace," Trump wrote in a mes...

item.title: Sheinbaum reassures Mexico after US military movements spark concern
item.description: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum quelled concerns on Monday about two recent movements of the U.S. military in the vicinity of Mexico that have the...

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Hundreds of active-duty troops on are standby to deploy to Minnesota, Trump escalates tensions across Europe with new threats over Greenland, Israel r...

item.title: Italian fashion designer Valentino dies at 93
item.description: Garavani built one of the most recognizable luxury brands in the world. His clients included royalty, Hollywood stars, and first ladies.

item.title: Troops stand by to enter Minnesota. And, Trump plans for a Board of Peace
item.description: Minnesota braces for federal troops amid immigration protests. And, Trump asks nations to buy into a new U.S.-led board of peace to manage Gaza and ot...

item.title: At the scene of Spain's worst rail disaster in over a decade
item.description: The BBC's Guy Hedgecoe visited the scene, where a large police cordon is in place.

item.title: Trump ties Greenland demands to Nobel Prize in message to Norway leader
item.description: The US president insists Norway controls who gets the coveted prize, which the Norwegian government says it has nothing to do with it.

item.title: Oregon baby is still battling infant botulism after ByHeart formula exposure
Christian leaders urge the protection of worshippers’ rights after protesters interrupt service
Judge, wife shot in home in Lafayette, Indiana
item.description: A judge and his wife were shot in their home this past weekend in Lafayette, Indiana.

item.title: Trump links Greenland standoff with allies to perceived Nobel snub
item.description: As his standoff with America's closest allies escalates, President Trump says not getting the Nobel Peace Prize means he's no longer obligated "to thi...

item.title: Italian fashion designer Valentino dies aged 93
item.description: One of the giants of 20th century fashion, his creations were worn by celebrities including Elizabeth Taylor, Julia Roberts and Gwyneth Paltrow.

item.title: New surveillance video shows Louvre jewel heist in action
item.description: The video shows burglars slicing into display cases under the eyes of several Louvre Museum staff members who do not intervene.

item.title: Fire at mall in Pakistan kills at least 23 people; dozens missing
item.description: Firefighters extinguished the blaze at the multistory plaza nearly 24 hours after it erupted.

item.title: What we know about Spain's worst rail disaster in over a decade
item.description: What caused the train to derail remains unclear but officials say an investigation has been launched.

item.title: Clashes reported after Syria and Kurdish-led forces agree ceasefire
item.description: An agreement between the government and the SDF will bring an autonomous region in the north-east under state control.

item.title: Aftermath of deadly fire at Pakistan shopping mall captured in videos
item.description: A massive fire broke out at a shopping mall in Karachi, Pakistan, over the weekend, killing at least 23 people with dozens more missing. Videos captur...

item.title: The US political climate spurs efforts to reclaim the MLK holiday
item.description: Communities across the U.S. held parades, panels and service projects for the 40th anniversary of Martin Luther King Jr. Day.
